articles.title: If the Tesla Model S was built in 1978, it would have been this, the Endura electric car - Drive
articles.description: Over 30 years before Tesla changed the world with its original Model S, American company Globe-Union built this family-sized electric car.
articles.content: Then, as now, recharging remained a lengthy process. Globe-Union promised the Enduras on board charger uses a 110-volt, 30-amp circuit and takes 14 to 16 hours to fully recharge a discharged battery … [+140 chars]

articles.title: Congenital anomalies during the 2015–2018 Zika virus epidemic: a population-based cross-sectional study - BMC Public Health - BMC Public Health
articles.description: Background Congenital anomalies are associated with several clinical and epidemiological complications. Following the Zika epidemic onset in Latin America, the incidence of congenital anomalies increased in Brazil. This study aimed to determine the frequency …

articles.title: Work from home: Can it be permanently scrapped? - CTV News
articles.description: After Elon Musk announced that he plans to scrap Twitter’s 'work from anywhere policy,' it raises questions about the future of permanent remote work in North America and if it's here to stay.
articles.content: After Elon Musk unceremoniously laid off roughly 50 per cent of Twitter's workforce, he announced this week that he plans to scrap the company's 'work from anywhere policy' and mandate a full-time re… [+5689 chars]

articles.author: Tim Watkin
articles.title: Is the beginning of the end of the toxic Trump TV show? - RNZ
articles.description: These mid-terms have the look of a moment where America's breathed out its Trumpish toxins, writes political commentator Tim Watkin.
